subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|雨|而|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=rain}} – to wait till the rain is over.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[await]]
# to [[need]]; to [[require]]
# [[necessaries]]; [[necessities]]
# [[should]]; [[ought to]]; [[must]]
# [[fifth]] [[hexagram]] of the [[I Ching]]
